name: stdlib-datasets-suthaharan-single-hop-sensor-network
title: Single-Hop Sensor Network
description: Labeled wireless sensor network data set collected from a simple single-hop wireless sensor network deployment using TelosB motes.

resources.name: suthaharan-single-hop-sensor-network-json
resources.title: Single-Hop Sensor Network
resources.description: Labeled wireless sensor network data set collected from a simple single-hop wireless sensor network deployment using TelosB motes.

resources.name: suthaharan-single-hop-sensor-network-csv
resources.title: Single-Hop Sensor Network
resources.description: Labeled wireless sensor network data set collected from a simple single-hop wireless sensor network deployment using TelosB motes.

fields.name: indoor
fields.title: Indoor/Outdoor
fields.description: Indicator specifying whether a mote is an indoor (1) or an outdoor (0) sensor.

fields.name: humidity
fields.title: Humidity
fields.description: Temperature corrected relative humidity, ranging from 0-100%.

fields.name: label
fields.title: Label
fields.description: Indicator specifying whether data is "normal" (0) or is influenced by an introduced event (1).

sources.name: Labelled Wireless Sensor Network Data Repository (LWSNDR)
